definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Lin Junyan, a young, handsome rich merchant, meets Bai Mengzhu, a naive beauty with nice personality.
sentences.chinese: 年轻英俊的富商林俊彦偶遇美丽脱俗的白梦竹。

sentences.english: Wonderfull lines and harmonious colors are suggesting some beautiful things beyond the earth.
sentences.chinese: 优美的线条，和谐的色彩，令人感觉清新脱俗。

sentences.english: Bamboo flower is beautiful, is the kind of Qingli refined beauty.
sentences.chinese: 竹花很美，是那种清丽脱俗的美。

sentences.english: Fishing people immersed in the flowers, there is an extraordinary feeling refined.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼人沉浸在鸟语花香里，有一种超凡脱俗的感觉。

sentences.english: They scattered and cultural stories in a refined performance of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他们在散文化小说中表现出了脱俗的世事。

sentences.english: What reflect goodwife adequately on design style is decorous and free from vulgarity.
sentences.chinese: 在设计风格上充分体现女主人的高雅脱俗。

sentences.english: Transparent pen cap with floating Montblanc star. Modern and stylish design.
sentences.chinese: 透明笔套末端悬浮万宝龙星形标志，设计时尚脱俗。

sentences.english: Astana is clean, orderly and seemingly sedated.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯塔纳干净整洁，秩序井然，超凡脱俗。

sentences.english: Stone lets Ma Yiqun's home appear natural and free from vulgarity .
sentences.chinese: 石头让马益群的家显得自然脱俗。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3

definition: quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
